title: Full-Stack AI Developer Job at Blucon Valley Limited
content:
Blucon Valley Limited is a dynamic and forward-thinking technology company committed to delivering cutting-edge software solutions tailored to meet the evolving needs of businesses across the globe. We specialize in the design, development, customization, implementation, and maintenance of high-quality software systems. Our services span across the full spectrum of the software development lifecycle, including rigorous testing and benchmarking to ensure optimal performance and reliability.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Full-Stack AI Developer

Job Location: Remote or Lagos, Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time
Company: Blucon Valley
Start Date: Immediately
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Summary


	We are looking for a talented and innovative Full-Stack AI Developer to join our growing team.
	You’ll be responsible for building and deploying scalable, AI-powered web and mobile applications that transform how our clients work.
	If you’re passionate about AI integration, automation, full-stack, and mobile development, we’d love to hear from you.


Key Responsibilities


	Build and deploy AI-integrated web and mobile applications using OpenAI, LangChain, and other LLM tools.
	Design and maintain scalable front-end and back-end systems using frameworks like React, REST API, or FastAPI.
	Develop and automate AI agents and workflows using n8n.
	Build cross-platform mobile apps using React Native or Flutter.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams (product, business, and design) to deliver client-ready solutions.
	Deploy services on cloud platforms and ensure reliable monitoring and performance.
	Integrate third-party tools (e.g., Google Sheets, CRMs, WhatsApp APIs).
	Optimize development speed using AI IDEs like Cursor, Windsurf, or GitHub Copilot.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an SSCE / GCE / NECO qualification
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in full-stack development.
	Experience building mobile apps using React Native or Flutter.
	Proficient with n8n, OpenAI APIs, LangChain, and prompt engineering.
	Familiarity with tools and workflows for AI-based development and automation.
	Ability to work independently with a problem-solving and results-oriented mindset.
	Strong back-end skills and deep knowledge of servers and databases.
	Solid experience with API integration and cloud services.
	Strong analytical and creative thinking skills.


Preferred Skills (Bonus Points):


	Experience in building LLM-powered chatbots or agents.
	Background in machine learning or data science.
	Knowledge of DevOps practices for CI/CD deployment.
	Startup or fast-paced project experience.


Why Join Us?


	Work with a forward-thinking team on cutting-edge AI, automation, and mobile projects.
	Flexible remote work options or access to a Lagos-based workspace.
	Opportunity to make a real impact in a growing tech-driven company.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, portfolio (if applicable), and a brief note on why they are a great fit for this role to: contact@bluconvalley.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: ChatGPT Content Creator Job at Kumesoft Technology
content:
Kumesoft Technology is a fast-growing digital marketing and technology agency focused on helping businesses harness AI to scale their marketing, content, and customer engagement. We develop SaaS platforms, custom AI solutions, and content services for clients across Africa and beyond.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: ChatGPT Content Creator

Job Location: Remote
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a creative and detail-oriented ChatGPT Content Creator to generate high-quality written content for blogs, websites, social media, and marketing campaigns using AI tools, primarily OpenAI’s ChatGPT.
	You will be responsible for planning, generating, editing, and delivering engaging content tailored to target audiences and optimized for SEO.
	The ideal candidate has excellent writing skills, is comfortable working with AI tools, and understands how to guide prompts to achieve clear and professional outputs.


Key Responsibilities


	
	Use ChatGPT and other AI tools to produce a wide range of content, including:

	
		Blog articles
		Website copy
		Social media posts
		Product descriptions
		Email newsletters.
	
	
	Develop, test, and refine prompts to generate accurate, relevant, and engaging content
	Edit and polish AI-generated drafts to ensure clarity, tone, and brand consistency
	Research topics and keywords to inform content strategy and support SEO objectives
	Collaborate with marketing and design teams to align content with campaign goals
	Manage and prioritize multiple content requests and deadlines
	Maintain an organized library of prompts, templates, and generated materials
	Provide feedback and ideas to improve AI content workflows and processes.


Required Skills & Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree
	Minimum of 2 years of professional experience in content writing, copywriting, or marketing
	Strong proficiency in English grammar, spelling, and style
	Familiarity with AI writing tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Jasper, Copy.ai)
	Excellent attention to detail and ability to self-edit
	Strong organizational and time management skills
	Experience crafting effective prompts to guide AI-generated output
	Basic understanding of SEO principles and keyword usage
	Proactive mindset and ability to work independently in a remote environment.


Nice to Have:


	Experience creating content for diverse industries (e.g., SaaS, e-commerce, finance)
	Familiarity with content management systems (WordPress, Webflow)
	Understanding of social media strategy and trends
	Knowledge of additional AI tools for image or video content creation.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary (N50,000 - N70,000 monthly), based on experience
	Flexible remote work
	Access to premium AI tools and resources
	Skill development and training in AI content creation
	Supportive and collaborative team environment
	Opportunities for career growth as we scale our AI services.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume, Writing Portfolio, and a brief Cover Letter highlighting relevant experience to: idoho.denis.tu@gmail.com using "ChatGPT Content Creator" as the subject of the email.

title: Job Vacancies at Blume Distribution Limited
content:
Blume Distribution Limited is a marketer and distributor of unique brands that bring joy to millions of consumers across Africa. The company is a recognized market leader in tomato mix marketing sales and distribution of other range of Non Diary Creamer and Culinary products. Blume Nigeria Limited is a major marketer and distribution company for Sonia Foods Nigeria which is one of Nigeria's leading tomato mix, food and beverages manufacturers.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Van Sales Representative (VSRs)

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Part-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking proactive and results-driven Van Sales Representatives (VSRs) to join our sales team in Rivers State, the ideal candidate will be responsible for selling and delivering our products to existing and prospective customers, ensuring route coverage, and achieving daily and monthly sales targets.


Key Responsibilities


	Drive the company’s sales van within the assigned territory (Port Harcourt).
	Sell and distribute products to retail outlets, supermarkets, and other sales points.
	Build and maintain strong customer relationships to encourage repeat business.
	Ensure daily sales targets are met or exceeded.
	Monitor stock levels in the van and ensure an optimal product mix is maintained.
	Collect payments and issue receipts accurately.
	Keep accurate records of all sales, deliveries, and customer feedback.
	Ensure products are properly merchandised at customer locations.
	Submit daily reports on sales performance and market feedback to the sales supervisor.


Requirements


	Minimum of SSCE / OND qualification.
	2–5 years of experience in FMCG or route-to-market sales is preferred.
	Must possess a valid driver’s license and any other required driving document in the state.
	Familiarity with port Harcourt Road network and its environs is a strong advantage.
	Good communication, negotiation, and customer service skills.
	Ability to work independently and under pressure.
	Honest, reliable, and target-oriented.


Remuneration


	Salary: N100,000 - N150,000 / month.
	Attractive salary with sales-based incentives, pension, and HMO.


Application Closing Date: 15th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: careers@blumedistribution.com CC: Oluchi.Sunday@blumedistribution.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Talent Acquisition Executive (with Data Analytical Expertise) 

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking an experienced and data-savvy talent acquisition executive to join our growing HR team.
	The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 5 years of hands-on experience in recruitment and talent management, combined with strong analytical skills and proficiency in Excel and/or other data analysis tools.
	This role involves managing end-to-end recruitment processes while using data to evaluate sourcing channels, recruitment performance, and talent pipelines.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage full-cycle recruitment for various roles across departments, including sourcing, interviewing, and onboarding.
	Develop and implement effective talent acquisition strategies to attract high-quality candidates.
	Use Excel, Google Sheets, or data analysis tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau, Python, etc.) to track, analyze, and report on recruitment metrics such as time-to-hire, cost-per-hire, and sourcing effectiveness.
	Partner with hiring managers to understand workforce needs and ensure alignment with organizational goals.
	Maintain and update the Applicant Tracking System (ATS) and ensure data integrity for reporting purposes.
	Build and maintain a talent pipeline through proactive sourcing and networking strategies.
	Provide data-driven insights to improve hiring decisions and processes.
	Support employer branding initiatives and represent the organization at job fairs, campus drives, and industry events.
	Conduct market mapping and competitor analysis to inform talent strategies.
	Assist in workforce planning and talent management projects.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in human resources, business administration, statistics, or a related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in talent acquisition, recruitment, or talent management.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel (pivot tables, VLOOKUP, dashboards) and other data analysis/reporting tools.
	Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
	Analytical mindset with attention to detail and data accuracy.
	Familiarity with Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) and HRIS software.
	Strong understanding of recruitment best practices, employment laws, and HR trends.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple priorities.


Preferred Skills (Added Advantage):


	Experience using advanced analytics tools such as Power BI, SQL, or Python.
	Knowledge of diversity hiring practices and global talent acquisition trends.
	Certification in Talent Acquisition or HR Analytics


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and benefits package
	Opportunity to work with a dynamic and data-driven HR team
	Professional development and career growth opportunities
	A culture that values innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning.


Application Closing Date: 20th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: Oluchi.Sunday@blumedistribution.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Digital Marketing Specialist

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking an experienced and innovative Digital Marketing Specialist with a proven track record in driving digital campaigns and brand visibility within the FMCG sector in Nigeria.
	The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of the local market, consumer behavior, and digital trends that influence purchasing decisions.
	This role requires a strategic thinker who can blend creativity with data-driven marketing approaches to grow our digital footprint and deliver measurable ROI.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute integrated digital marketing strategies across platforms (social media, SEO/SEM, email, web, mobile, influencer, and content marketing) tailored to the Nigerian FMCG landscape.
	Plan, manage, and optimize paid media campaigns (Google Ads, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, etc.) to drive brand awareness, engagement, and conversions.
	Identify and engage digital influencers and KOLs to amplify brand presence and consumer loyalty.
	Monitor trends in digital marketing and FMCG competition to stay ahead of the curve.
	Collaborate with brand, sales, and product teams to align digital marketing efforts with business objectives and product launches.
	Analyze digital performance metrics and provide actionable insights to improve reach, engagement, and ROI.
	Manage and grow the company’s online community, maintaining brand voice and consistency across platforms.
	Lead content development strategy—writing, editing, and commissioning impactful content in line with brand tone.
	Manage digital agencies, media partners, and third-party service providers for campaign execution and optimization.
	Prepare monthly reports and dashboards for senior management on key digital KPIs and campaign effectiveness.


Qualifications and Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, communications, business administration, or related field. A relevant master’s degree or digital marketing certification is a plus.
	Minimum of 5 years of hands-on experience in digital marketing within the Nigerian FMCG industry.
	Strong expertise in paid media management, SEO/SEM, content creation, and performance analysis.
	Proficient in tools such as Google Analytics, Meta Ads Manager, Google Ads, Hootsuite, Mailchimp, Canva, and similar platforms.
	Demonstrated ability to conceptualize and execute high-impact campaigns within tight deadlines and budget constraints.
	Deep knowledge of Nigerian consumer behavior and regional market dynamics.
	Excellent communication, analytical thinking, and stakeholder management skills.
	Creative flair with a passion for emerging trends in digital and consumer marketing.


What We Offer


	A dynamic and inclusive work environment within a leading FMCG brand.
	Opportunities for growth, learning, and career advancement.
	Competitive remuneration and performance-based incentives.
	Exposure to cross-functional teams and innovative marketing projects.


Application Closing Date: 15th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV and a brief portfolio of successful digital campaigns to: Oluchi.Sunday@blumedistribution.com CC: careers@blumedistribution.com using the Job Position a sthe subject of the mail.
